title: Astrapaeus
description: The DÃ¦mon Prince has broken from his prison. Revenge is on foremost on his mind. The Elven High King must die, as well as all those who support him. Bartholomew is an apprentice mage. On his first journey to Glendale he becomes embroiled in a bloody battle. Although many doubt his powers, he must show the world what an Aether Phaser can do. The Sun Lord has chosen a new War-Priest. Ryton has been charged to free the Holy Isle from its occupiers. Even if it means facing a Dragon.
author: D.J. Blount
